name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.action.dataQuery
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        editor/prompt_query:
          label: Query:
          required@bool: yes
          syntax: cerb_query
          default@text:
            type:worklist.records
            of:ticket
            query:(
              status:!d
              created:"-1 month"
            )
            expand:[custom_]
            format:dictionaries

  return:
    snippet@text:
      data.query/{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
        inputs:
          query@text:
            {{prompt_query|indent('      ',2)}}
        output: data_results
        #on_simulate:
        #on_success:
        #on_error:
